General.Name: Adese Gayrimenkul Yatirim AS
General.Description: Adese Gayrimenkul Yatirim A.S. operates in the real estate investment sector. It engages in the operation and management of shopping malls and entertainment centers. The company was formerly known as Adese Alisveris Merkezleri Ticaret A.S. Adese Gayrimenkul Yatirim A.S. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Selçuklu, Turkey.
